segments.source_content:
---
sidebar_position: 0
description: API reference for Docusaurus configuration file.
slug: /api/docusaurus-config
---

:::info

Refer to the Getting Started [**Configuration**](../configuration.mdx) for examples.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

請參閱入門指南中的[**配置**](../configuration.mdx)章節以獲取範例。

:::

segments.source_content: `docusaurus.config.js` contains configurations for your site and is placed in the root directory of your site.

translations.zh-hant: `docusaurus.config.js` 包含您網站的配置，並放置在網站的根目錄中。

segments.source_content:
:::note

With a [TypeScript](../typescript-support.mdx) Docusaurus codebase your config file may be called `docusaurus.config.ts`. The syntax is broadly identical to the `js` config file with the addition of types. You can see an example on the [Docusaurus Website](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/blob/main/website/docusaurus.config.ts) itself.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

若使用 [TypeScript](../typescript-support.mdx) 的 Docusaurus 程式碼庫，您的配置檔案可能命名為 `docusaurus.config.ts`。其語法與 `js` 配置檔案大致相同，僅增加了類型定義。您可以在 [Docusaurus 官方網站](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/blob/main/website/docusaurus.config.ts)上查看範例。

:::

segments.source_content: This file is run in Node.js and should export a site configuration object, or a function that creates it.

translations.zh-hant: 此檔案在 Node.js 環境中執行，應導出一個網站配置物件，或一個創建該物件的函數。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Refer to [**Syntax to declare `docusaurus.config.js`**](../configuration.mdx#syntax-to-declare-docusaurus-config) for a more exhaustive list of examples and explanations.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

請參閱[**宣告 `docusaurus.config.js` 的語法**](../configuration.mdx#syntax-to-declare-docusaurus-config)以獲得更詳盡的範例與說明。

:::

segments.source_content: Title for your website. Will be used in metadata and as browser tab title.

translations.zh-hant: 網站的標題。將用於元數據及瀏覽器分頁標題。

segments.source_content: URL for your website. This can also be considered the top-level hostname. For example, `https://facebook.github.io` is the URL of https://facebook.github.io/metro/, and `https://docusaurus.io` is the URL for https://docusaurus.io. This field is related to the [`baseUrl`](#baseUrl) field.

translations.zh-hant: 網站的 URL。亦可視為頂層域名。例如，`https://facebook.github.io` 是 https://facebook.github.io/metro/ 的 URL，而 `https://docusaurus.io` 是 https://docusaurus.io 的 URL。此欄位與 [`baseUrl`](#baseUrl) 欄位相關。

segments.source_content: Base URL for your site. Can be considered as the path after the host. For example, `/metro/` is the base URL of https://facebook.github.io/metro/. For URLs that have no path, the baseUrl should be set to `/`. This field is related to the [`url`](#url) field. Always has both leading and trailing slash.

translations.zh-hant: 網站的基礎 URL。可視為主機名後的路徑。例如，`/metro/` 是 https://facebook.github.io/metro/ 的基礎 URL。對於沒有路徑的 URL，應將 `baseUrl` 設為 `/`。此欄位與 [`url`](#url) 欄位相關。前後均需包含斜線。

segments.source_content: Path to your site favicon; must be a URL that can be used in link's href. For example, if your favicon is in `static/img/favicon.ico`:

translations.zh-hant: 網站圖示的路徑；必須是可作為連結 href 使用的 URL。例如，若您的圖示位於 `static/img/favicon.ico`：

segments.source_content: Allow to customize the presence/absence of a trailing slash at the end of URLs/links, and how static HTML files are generated:

translations.zh-hant: 允許自訂 URL/連結末尾斜線的存在與否，以及靜態 HTML 檔案的生成方式：

segments.source_content:
- `undefined` (default): keeps URLs untouched, and emit `/docs/myDoc/index.html` for `/docs/myDoc.md`
- `true`: add trailing slashes to URLs/links, and emit `/docs/myDoc/index.html` for `/docs/myDoc.md`
- `false`: remove trailing slashes from URLs/links, and emit `/docs/myDoc.html` for `/docs/myDoc.md`

translations.zh-hant:
- `undefined`（預設值）：保持 URL 不變，並為 `/docs/myDoc.md` 生成 `/docs/myDoc/index.html`
- `true`：為 URL/連結添加末尾斜線，並為 `/docs/myDoc.md` 生成 `/docs/myDoc/index.html`
- `false`：移除 URL/連結的末尾斜線，並為 `/docs/myDoc.md` 生成 `/docs/myDoc.html`

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Each static hosting provider serves static files differently (this behavior may even change over time).

Refer to the [deployment guide](../deployment.mdx) and [slorber/trailing-slash-guide](https://github.com/slorber/trailing-slash-guide) to choose the appropriate setting.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

每個靜態託管服務提供商處理靜態文件的方式不同（此行為可能隨時間變化）。

請參考[部署指南](../deployment.mdx)和[slorber/trailing-slash-guide](https://github.com/slorber/trailing-slash-guide)以選擇適當的設定。

:::

segments.source_content: The i18n configuration object to [localize your site](../i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 用於[本地化網站](../i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx)的i18n配置物件。

segments.source_content:
- `defaultLocale`: The locale that (1) does not have its name in the base URL (2) gets started with `docusaurus start` without `--locale` option (3) will be used for the `<link hrefLang="x-default">` tag
- `locales`: List of locales deployed on your site. Must contain `defaultLocale`.
- `path`: Root folder which all locale folders are relative to. Can be absolute or relative to the config file. Defaults to `i18n`.
- `localeConfigs`: Individual options for each locale.
  - `label`: The label displayed for this locale in the locales dropdown.
  - `direction`: `ltr` (default) or `rtl` (for [right-to-left languages](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary/rtl) like Farsi, Arabic, Hebrew, etc.). Used to select the locale's CSS and HTML meta attribute.
  - `htmlLang`: BCP 47 language tag to use in `<html lang="...">` (or any other DOM tag name) and in `<link ... hreflang="...">`
  - `calendar`: the [calendar](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/Locale/calendar) used to calculate the date era. Note that it doesn't control the actual string displayed: `MM/DD/YYYY` and `DD/MM/YYYY` are both `gregory`. To choose the format (`DD/MM/YYYY` or `MM/DD/YYYY`), set your locale name to `en-GB` or `en-US` (`en` means `en-US`).
  - `path`: Root folder that all plugin localization folders of this locale are relative to. Will be resolved against `i18n.path`. Defaults to the locale's name. Note: this has no effect on the locale's `baseUrl`—customization of base URL is a work-in-progress.

translations.zh-hant:
- `defaultLocale`: 預設語言環境，其特徵為 (1) 基礎URL中不包含語言名稱 (2) 執行`docusaurus start`時無需`--locale`參數 (3) 用於`<link hrefLang="x-default">`標籤
- `locales`: 網站支援的語言環境列表。必須包含`defaultLocale`。
- `path`: 所有語言環境資料夾的根目錄。可為絕對路徑或相對於配置文件的相對路徑。預設為`i18n`。
- `localeConfigs`: 各語言環境的個別設定。
  - `label`: 在語言下拉選單中顯示的標籤。
  - `direction`: `ltr`（預設）或`rtl`（適用於[從右至左書寫的語言](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary/rtl)如波斯語、阿拉伯語、希伯來語等）。用於選擇該語言的CSS和HTML meta屬性。
  - `htmlLang`: 用於`<html lang="...">`（或其他DOM標籤）和`<link ... hreflang="...">`的BCP 47語言標籤。
  - `calendar`: 用於計算日期紀元的[曆法](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/Locale/calendar)。注意這不控制實際顯示的日期格式：`MM/DD/YYYY`和`DD/MM/YYYY`都屬於`gregory`曆法。要選擇格式需設置語言名稱如`en-GB`或`en-US`（`en`預設為`en-US`）。
  - `path`: 該語言所有插件本地化資料夾的根目錄。將基於`i18n.path`解析。預設為語言名稱。注意：這不影響該語言的`baseUrl`——基礎URL的客製化功能仍在開發中。

segments.source_content: The `future` configuration object permits to opt-in for upcoming/unstable/experimental Docusaurus features that are not ready for prime time.

translations.zh-hant: `future`配置物件允許您選擇啟用尚未成熟/不穩定/實驗性的Docusaurus功能。

segments.source_content: It is also a way to opt-in for upcoming breaking changes coming in the next major versions, enabling you to prepare your site for the next version while staying on the previous one. The [Remix Future Flags blog post](https://remix.run/blog/future-flags) greatly explains this idea.

translations.zh-hant: 這也是為下個主要版本中的重大變更做準備的方式，讓您能在當前版本中提前適應。此概念在[Remix Future Flags部落格文章](https://remix.run/blog/future-flags)中有詳細說明。

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Breaking changes in minor versions]

Features prefixed by `experimental_` or `unstable_` are subject to changes in **minor versions**, and not considered as [Semantic Versioning breaking changes](/community/release-process).

Features prefixed by `v<MajorVersion>_` (`v6_` `v7_`, etc.) are future flags that are expected to be turned on by default in the next major versions. These are less likely to change, but we keep the possibility to do so.

`future` API breaking changes should be easy to handle, and will be documented in minor/major version blog posts.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::danger[次要版本中的重大變更]

標記為`experimental_`或`unstable_`的功能可能在**次要版本**中發生變更，且不被視為[語意化版本的重大變更](/community/release-process)。

標記為`v<MajorVersion>_`（如`v6_`、`v7_`等）的功能標誌預計將在下個主要版本中默認啟用。這些功能較少變動，但我們保留變更的權利。

`future` API的重大變更應易於處理，並會在次要/主要版本的部落格文章中說明。

:::

segments.source_content:
- `experimental_storage`: Site-wide browser storage options that theme authors should strive to respect.
  - `type`: The browser storage theme authors should use. Possible values are `localStorage` and `sessionStorage`. Defaults to `localStorage`.
  - `namespace`: Whether to namespace the browser storage keys to avoid storage key conflicts when Docusaurus sites are hosted under the same domain, or on localhost. Possible values are `string | boolean`. The namespace is appended at the end of the storage keys `key-namespace`. Use `true` to automatically generate a random namespace from your site `url + baseUrl`. Defaults to `false` (no namespace, historical behavior).
- `experimental_router`: The router type to use. Possible values are `browser` and `hash`. Defaults to `browser`. The `hash` router is only useful for rare cases where you want to opt-out of static site generation, have a fully client-side app with a single `index.html` entrypoint file. This can be useful to distribute a Docusaurus site as a `.zip` archive that you can [browse locally without running a web server](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3825).

translations.zh-hant:
- `experimental_storage`: 全站瀏覽器儲存選項，主題開發者應盡量遵循。
  - `type`: 主題開發者應使用的瀏覽器儲存類型。可能值為 `localStorage` 和 `sessionStorage`。預設為 `localStorage`。
  - `namespace`: 是否為瀏覽器儲存鍵添加命名空間，以避免當多個 Docusaurus 網站托管在同一網域或 localhost 時發生鍵衝突。可能值為 `string | boolean`。命名空間會附加在儲存鍵末尾 `key-namespace`。使用 `true` 會根據網站 `url + baseUrl` 自動生成隨機命名空間。預設為 `false`（無命名空間，歷史行為）。
- `experimental_router`: 使用的路由類型。可能值為 `browser` 和 `hash`。預設為 `browser`。`hash` 路由僅適用於特殊情況，例如您希望退出靜態網站生成，擁有完全客戶端應用且僅有單一 `index.html` 入口文件。這對於將 Docusaurus 網站打包為 `.zip` 壓縮檔分發很有用，可[無需運行網頁伺服器即可本地瀏覽](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3825)。

segments.source_content: This option adds `<meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow">` to every page to tell search engines to avoid indexing your site (more information [here](https://moz.com/learn/seo/robots-meta-directives)).

translations.zh-hant: 此選項會在所有頁面添加 `<meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow">`，告知搜尋引擎避免索引您的網站（更多資訊[請參閱](https://moz.com/learn/seo/robots-meta-directives)）。

segments.source_content: The behavior of Docusaurus when it detects any broken link.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 偵測到失效連結時的行為。

segments.source_content: By default, it throws an error, to ensure you never ship any broken link.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下會拋出錯誤，以確保您不會發布任何失效連結。

segments.source_content:
:::note

The broken links detection is only available for a production build (`docusaurus build`).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

失效連結偵測僅在生產環境建置 (`docusaurus build`) 時可用。

:::

segments.source_content: The behavior of Docusaurus when it detects any broken anchor declared with the `Heading` component of Docusaurus.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 偵測到使用 Docusaurus `Heading` 元件宣告的失效錨點時的行為。

segments.source_content: By default, it prints a warning, to let you know about your broken anchors.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下會顯示警告，讓您知曉失效錨點。

segments.source_content: The behavior of Docusaurus when it detects any broken Markdown link.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 偵測到失效 Markdown 連結時的行為。

segments.source_content: By default, it prints a warning, to let you know about your broken Markdown link.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下會顯示警告，讓您知曉失效 Markdown 連結。

segments.source_content: The behavior of Docusaurus when it detects any [duplicate routes](/guides/creating-pages.mdx#duplicate-routes).

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 偵測到[重複路由](/guides/creating-pages.mdx#duplicate-routes)時的行為。

segments.source_content: By default, it displays a warning after you run `yarn start` or `yarn build`.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下會在執行 `yarn start` 或 `yarn build` 後顯示警告。

segments.source_content: The GitHub user or organization that owns the repository. You don't need this if you are not using the `docusaurus deploy` command.

translations.zh-hant: 擁有該儲存庫的 GitHub 用戶或組織。若不使用 `docusaurus deploy` 指令則無需設定。

segments.source_content: The name of the GitHub repository. You don't need this if you are not using the `docusaurus deploy` command.

translations.zh-hant: GitHub 儲存庫的名稱。如果您不使用 `docusaurus deploy` 指令，則不需要此設定。

segments.source_content: The name of the branch to deploy the static files to. You don't need this if you are not using the `docusaurus deploy` command.

translations.zh-hant: 部署靜態檔案的分支名稱。如果您不使用 `docusaurus deploy` 指令，則不需要此設定。

segments.source_content: The hostname of your server. Useful if you are using GitHub Enterprise. You don't need this if you are not using the `docusaurus deploy` command.

translations.zh-hant: 伺服器的主機名稱。如果您使用 GitHub Enterprise 時會有用。如果您不使用 `docusaurus deploy` 指令，則不需要此設定。

segments.source_content: The port of your server. Useful if you are using GitHub Enterprise. You don't need this if you are not using the `docusaurus deploy` command.

translations.zh-hant: 伺服器的連接埠。如果您使用 GitHub Enterprise 時會有用。如果您不使用 `docusaurus deploy` 指令，則不需要此設定。

segments.source_content: The [theme configuration](./themes/theme-configuration.mdx) object to customize your site UI like navbar and footer.

translations.zh-hant: [主題設定](./themes/theme-configuration.mdx)物件，用於自訂網站 UI，例如導覽列和頁尾。

segments.source_content: See [plugin method references](./plugin-methods/README.mdx) for the shape of a `PluginModule`.

translations.zh-hant: 請參閱[外掛方法參考](./plugin-methods/README.mdx)以了解 `PluginModule` 的結構。
全域的 Docusaurus Markdown 設定。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `format` | `'mdx' \| 'md' \| 'detect'` | `'mdx'` | The default parser format to use for Markdown content. Using 'detect' will select the appropriate format automatically based on file extensions: `.md` vs `.mdx`. |
| `mermaid` | `boolean` | `false` | When `true`, allows Docusaurus to render Markdown code blocks with `mermaid` language as Mermaid diagrams. |
| `preprocessor` | `MarkdownPreprocessor` | `undefined` | Gives you the ability to alter the Markdown content string before parsing. Use it as a last-resort escape hatch or workaround: it is almost always better to implement a Remark/Rehype plugin. |
| `parseFrontMatter` | `ParseFrontMatter` | `undefined` | Gives you the ability to provide your own front matter parser, or to enhance the default parser. Read our [front matter guide](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-intro.mdx#front-matter) for details. |
| `mdx1Compat` | `MDX1CompatOptions` | `{comments: true, admonitions: true, headingIds: true}` | Compatibility options to make it easier to upgrade to Docusaurus v3+. |
| `anchors` | `MarkdownAnchorsConfig` | `{maintainCase: false}` | Options to control the behavior of anchors generated from Markdown headings |
| `remarkRehypeOptions` | `object` | `undefined` | Makes it possible to pass custom [`remark-rehype` options](https://github.com/remarkjs/remark-rehype#options). |
Docusaurus guards `docusaurus.config.js` from unknown fields. To add a custom field, define it on `customFields`.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 會防止 `docusaurus.config.js` 中出現未知欄位。若要新增自訂欄位，請在 `customFields` 中定義。

segments.source_content: Attempting to add unknown fields in the config will lead to errors during build time:

translations.zh-hant: 嘗試在設定中新增未知欄位將導致建置時發生錯誤:

segments.source_content:
```bash
Error: The field(s) 'foo', 'bar' are not recognized in docusaurus.config.js
```
An array of paths, relative to the site's directory or absolute. Files under these paths will be copied to the build output as-is.

translations.zh-hant: 路徑陣列，可以是相對於網站目錄或絕對路徑。這些路徑下的檔案將原樣複製到建置輸出中。

segments.source_content: An array of tags that will be inserted in the HTML `<head>`. The values must be objects that contain two properties; `tagName` and `attributes`. `tagName` must be a string that determines the tag being created; eg `"link"`. `attributes` must be an attribute-value map.

translations.zh-hant: 將插入 HTML `<head>` 中的標籤陣列。值必須是包含兩個屬性的物件：`tagName` 和 `attributes`。`tagName` 必須是決定所建立標籤的字串，例如 `"link"`。`attributes` 必須是屬性-值的對應。
- 類型：`{ tagName: string; attributes: Object; }[]`

segments.source_content: This would become `<link rel="icon" href="img/docusaurus.png" />` in the generated HTML.

translations.zh-hant: 這將在生成的 HTML 中轉換為 `<link rel="icon" href="img/docusaurus.png" />`。

segments.source_content: An array of scripts to load. The values can be either strings or plain objects of attribute-value maps. The `<script>` tags will be inserted in the HTML `<head>`. If you use a plain object, the only required attribute is `src`, and any other attributes are permitted (each one should have boolean/string values).

translations.zh-hant: 要載入的腳本陣列。值可以是字串或屬性-值映射的純物件。`<script>` 標籤將插入到 HTML `<head>` 中。如果使用純物件，唯一必需的屬性是 `src`，其他屬性均允許（每個屬性應為布林值/字串值）。

segments.source_content: Note that `<script>` added here are render-blocking, so you might want to add `async: true`/`defer: true` to the objects.

translations.zh-hant: 請注意，此處添加的 `<script>` 會阻擋渲染，因此您可能需要為物件添加 `async: true`/`defer: true`。

segments.source_content: An array of CSS sources to load. The values can be either strings or plain objects of attribute-value maps. The `<link>` tags will be inserted in the HTML `<head>`. If you use an object, the only required attribute is `href`, and any other attributes are permitted (each one should have boolean/string values).

translations.zh-hant: 要載入的 CSS 來源陣列。值可以是字串或屬性-值映射的純物件。`<link>` 標籤將插入到 HTML `<head>` 中。如果使用物件，唯一必需的屬性是 `href`，其他屬性均允許（每個屬性應為布林值/字串值）。

segments.source_content:
:::info

By default, the `<link>` tags will have `rel="stylesheet"`, but you can explicitly add a custom `rel` value to inject any kind of `<link>` tag, not necessarily stylesheets.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

預設情況下，`<link>` 標籤會有 `rel="stylesheet"`，但您可以明確添加自訂的 `rel` 值來注入任何類型的 `<link>` 標籤，不一定是樣式表。

:::

segments.source_content: An array of [client modules](../advanced/client.mdx#client-modules) to load globally on your site.

translations.zh-hant: 要在您的網站上全域載入的[客戶端模組](../advanced/client.mdx#client-modules)陣列。

segments.source_content: An HTML template written in [Eta's syntax](https://eta.js.org/docs/syntax#syntax-overview) that will be used to render your application. This can be used to set custom attributes on the `body` tags, additional `meta` tags, customize the `viewport`, etc. Please note that Docusaurus will rely on the template to be correctly structured in order to function properly, once you do customize it, you will have to make sure that your template is compliant with the requirements from upstream.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 [Eta 語法](https://eta.js.org/docs/syntax#syntax-overview)編寫的 HTML 模板，將用於渲染您的應用程式。這可用於在 `body` 標籤上設置自訂屬性、添加額外的 `meta` 標籤、自訂 `viewport` 等。請注意，Docusaurus 依賴於模板的正確結構才能正常運作，一旦您自訂它，您必須確保您的模板符合上游的要求。

segments.source_content:
```js title="docusaurus.config.js" export default { ssrTemplate: ` > <% it.metaAttributes.forEach((metaAttribute) => { %> <%~ metaAttribute %> <% }); %> <%~ it.headTags %> <% it.stylesheets.forEach((stylesheet) => { %> <% }); %> <% it.scripts.forEach((script) => { %> <% }); %> > <%~ it.preBodyTags %>
<%~ it.appHtml %>
<% it.scripts.forEach((script) => { %> <% }); %> <%~ it.postBodyTags %> `, }; ```
Will be used as title delimiter in the generated `<title>` tag.

translations.zh-hant: 將用作生成的 `<title>` 標籤中的標題分隔符。

segments.source_content: When enabled, will show a banner in case your site can't load its CSS or JavaScript files, which is a very common issue, often related to a wrong `baseUrl` in site config.

translations.zh-hant: 啟用後，如果您的網站無法載入其 CSS 或 JavaScript 文件（這是一個非常常見的問題，通常與網站配置中的錯誤 `baseUrl` 有關），將顯示一個橫幅。

segments.source_content: ![A sample base URL issue banner. The style is very raw since the stylesheets failed to load. The text says "Your Docusaurus site did not load properly... Current configured baseUrl = / (default value); We suggest trying baseUrl = /build/](/img/baseUrlIssueBanner.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![一個基本的 URL 問題橫幅範例。由於樣式表未能載入，樣式非常原始。文字顯示「您的 Docusaurus 網站未能正確載入...當前配置的 baseUrl = /（預設值）；我們建議嘗試 baseUrl = /build/」](/img/baseUrlIssueBanner.png)

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This banner needs to inline CSS / JS in case all asset loading fails due to wrong base URL.

If you have a strict [Content Security Policy](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CSP), you should rather disable it.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

此橫幅需要在所有資源載入因錯誤的基礎 URL 而失敗時內聯 CSS/JS。

如果您有嚴格的[內容安全策略](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CSP)，您應該禁用它。

:::
